summary.name: metfrag
summary.description: MetFrag is a freely available software for the annotation of high precisiontandem mass spectra of metabolites which is a first and critical step forthe identification of a molecular structure. Candidate molecules of differentdatabases are fragmented in silico and matched against mass to charge values.A score calculated using the fragment peak matches gives hints to the qualityof the candidate spectrum assignment.
